桬字的基本解释

桬
shā
〔桬棠〕古书上说的一种果树，花红色，果实无核，味道像李子。

桬字的汉语字典释义

[①]［shā］
［《廣韻》所加切，平麻，生。］
见“桬棠”。

桬字的康熙字典解释

【辰集中】【木字部】　桬； 康熙笔画：11； 页码：页526第23
【唐韻】所加切【集韻】師加切，?音沙。【廣韻】桬棠，木名。出崑崙山。【玉篇】桬棠，花赤，實味如李，無核，食之使人不弱，可衞水。【司馬相如·上林賦】作沙棠。

桬字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体韩国明朝体
桬字的起名意思

暂无。

桬
Basic explanation of words
桬
shā
[Yangtang] A kind of fruit tree mentioned in ancient books, the flower is red, the fruit is seedless, and the taste is like plum.
桬
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①] [shā]
[The cut added in "Guangyun", plain hemp, raw. ]
See "Yetang".
桬
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Chen Ji] [Wood Character Department] 　桬; Kangxi Strokes: 11; Page Number: Page 526 23
[Tang Yun] added cut [Ji Yun] teacher added cut,? Yinsha. [Guang Yun] Tang, wooden name. Out of Kunlun Mountain. [Jade articles] Tang tang, red flowers, the real taste is like plum, seedless, food makes people not weak, can protect water. 【Sima Xiangru·Shanglin Fu】As Shatang.
桬
